panels.description: The name of the Aerospike Namespace ans Set where the vector values are stored

panels.title: Vector Index

panels.description: The current total of vectors upserted.
panels.title: Current Upserted Vectors

panels.description: Number on the left are the uncommited vectors and the number on the right are the commited vectors to the DB
panels.title: Index Merge Queue Depth

panels.description: What population concurrency action is being applied.
panels.title: Concurrency

panels.description: If a resource exhausted error occurs, what action should be performed.
panels.title: Exhausted Resource Handling

panels.description: After the records are populated, what  index action is performed...
panels.title: After Population Index Action

panels.description: This recall is calculated based on the distance between neighbors based on the ANN formulas.
panels.title: Recall (Distance)

panels.description: This recall is calculated based on the distance as returned by the Aerospike API using the ANN formulas.
panels.title: Recall (Aerospike Distance)

panels.description: This recall is calculated using the Big ANN's KNN neighbor formulas (distance is not used).
panels.title: KNN Recall (Nbors)

panels.description: The number of queries that fall within a certain latency buckets in milliseconds
panels.title: Vector Search Latency Buckets (ms)
